bMALLx-w6.memHandModelNotes: Generally, tied to water in the winter months, but will feed in adjacent ag fields, as well as urban bird feeders and city parks (Drilling et al. 2002). ***Do not restrict Ag to hydro buffer select when adjacent to PMU in hydro buffer. Amy Silvano 01Sept05
